extName.description: Extension name display as the title in extensions manager list.

extDescription.description: Short extension description display below the title in extensions manager list.

popup_title.description: Browser action button popup menu dialog title.

YDM_welcome_log.description: Console log welcome message immediately after the main script is injected on the page.

EnableDanmaku.description: Button title to enable Danmaku extension.

DisableDanmaku.description: Button title to disable Danmaku extension.

PostDanmaku.description: Section title of Settings view for posting Danmaku.

DanmakuContentPlaceholder.description: Placeholder at the Danmaku posting input textarea.

DanmakuPositionTop.description: Danmaku position type of fixed top.

DanmakuPositionBottom.description: Danmaku position type of fixed bottom.

DanmakuPositionMarquee.description: Danmaku position type of rolling marquee.

DanmakuSizeSmallAbbrv.description: Danmaku small font size abbreviation show on button.

DanmakuSizeLargeAbbrv.description: Danmaku large font size abbreviation show on button.

DanmakuSource.description: Section title of Settings view for load/unload Danmaku.

DanmakuURLPlaceholder.description: Placeholder at the Danmaku source URL input box.

Load.description: Button text to load Danmaku source URL.

Unload.description: Button text to unload Danmaku source.

Opacity.description: Section title of Settings view for Danmaku transparency.
